page.title: 20The Spratt and Winkle Line
page.content:
This line connected Andover to Southampton direct or to Portsmouth with a change at Eastleigh. It was an absolute Godsend in its final years as it provided rail connection hourly each way between these places, ideal for shopping in Southampton and for Royal Naval personnel stationed at Portsmouth, (Me included). Holiday makers and day trippers found the line very useful to get to the south coast and for light industry when Andover started growing in the 50`s and 60`s. Sadly a certain Dr. Beeching closed the line to save the Government of the day money.
BP
